name: Hidden Mysteries: Buckingham Palace
storyline: Peel back the curtains on one of the grandest buildings in the western world, Buckingham Palace, to look for treasure and uncover its deepest secrets. Learn fun facts about several royal locations while you search for hidden objects and play ingenious mini-games. Follow romantic notes strewn across beautifully rendered scenes and solve the mystery of the missing crown jewels!
summary: Peel back the curtains on one of the grandest buildings in the western world, Buckingham Palace, to look for treasure and uncover its deepest secrets.
